achievements.achieve_desc: Acquire a total of three stars.
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Makakuha ng total na tatlong bituin.

achievements.achieve_desc: Acquire a total of ten stars.
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Makakuha ng total na sampung bituin.

achievements.achieve_desc: Acquire a total of twenty stars.
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Makakuha ng total na dalawampung bituin.

achievements.achieve_desc: Get a perfect score on a quiz.
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Makakuha ng perpektong marka sa isang pagsusulit.

achievements.achieve_desc: Get three perfect score on quizzes.
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Makakuha ng perpektong marka sa tatlong pagsusulit.
Makakuha ng 100% kaunlaran sa lahat ng mga aralin.

achievements.achieve_desc: Get 100% progress and a perfect score on "Favourite" lesson
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Matapos ng buo at makakuha ng perpektong marka sa araling "Favourite."

achievements.achieve_desc: Get 100% progress and a perfect score on "Basics" lesson
achievements.achieve_desc_tagalog: Matapos ng buo at makakuha ng perpektong marka sa araling "Favourite."
